# kCIInputColor1Key

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set a color value of a Core Image filter.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputColor1Key: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIColor] instance.
title: kCIInputColor1Key
